title.rendered: Adelaide vs Sydney, Australian T20 League, 2022: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Probable XI for Adelaide: Jake Weatherald, Matthew Short, Chris Lynn, Adam Hose, Colin de Grandhomme, Thomas Kelly, Harry Nielsen (wk), Rashid Khan, Wes Agar, Henry Thornton, Peter Siddle (c)

Probable XI for Sydney: Alex Hales, Matthew Gilkes (wk), Rilee Rossouw, Alex Ross, Daniel Sams, Baxter Holt, Oliver Davies, Chris Green (c), Gurinder Sandhu, Brendan Doggett, Fazalhaq Farooqi

Pitch Report

Venue: Adelaide Oval, Adelaide

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 160

2nd innings average score: 144

Wickets per innings: 5

Type: Good batting wicket.

Weather: Showers forecast.

Wins

Batting 1st: 33%

Batting 2nd: 67%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

It is not to be forgotten that when these two teams met last week, Sydney were bowled out for an embarrassing total of 15. While Henry Thornton bagged a five-for, Wes Agar took a four-wicket haul.

One side of the square boundary is pretty short at the Adelaide Oval. 29 sixes have been launched in the last 3 T20s at the venue.

In the same period, 6 half-centuries have been registered in Adelaide, out of which 4 have been by the opening batters.
